hero.title: Excursion Studio - Digests
hero.description: Paper Guide and Paper Express series columns, aiming to provide high-quality paper interpretations and the latest research dynamics, with the hope of helping both colleagues and beginners.

teaser.title: Digests Forecast
teaser.description: In the future, we will update some paper digests related to aerial embodied systems, readers who are interested in this field can stay tuned!
features: ApexNav by Zhou's group (Star Lab) in South University of Science and Technology
Bearing-box estimator by Zhao's group (WINDY Lab) in Westlake University
AirHunt by Zhou's group (Star Lab) in South University of Science and Technology

items.title: Paper Guide 1 - Prespecified-Performance Kinematic Tracking Control for Aerial Manipulation
items.description: 这是我第一次写新手向的论文导读文摘，所以难免会有一些对刚开始看论文的新手不太友好的地方。若有不周或谬误之处，可以向工作室提出意见。
authors: Huazi Cao, Jiahao Shen, Zhengzhen Li, Qinquan Ren, Shiyu Zhao
